ygData.subject: get this
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay.. Imagine you duel a Druid one level higher than you. He flat beats yer ass.. harm touch does hack and his screaming macer is beatin yer ass while yer
ygData.messageBody:
Okay.. Imagine you duel a Druid one level higher than you. He flat beats yer
ass.. harm touch does hack and his screaming macer is beatin yer ass while
yer shiny brass halberd is doin 3 pts of damage. Silly..
I have almost a full suit of bronze.. 17th lev.. Shint brass halb, Derv
rings, spiked collar. I think that sk's ar HORRRIBLY dicked after this
duel.. No only was it not close.. it was humiliating. Verant better do
something or else shadowknights are gona die out. Especially when my HT does
about 40pts at 17th level to an `18 level pc.
i am Disgusted

Krimzin
]Tarew maar
